mapper.select: SELECT sum(d.count) FROM tb_order as s, tb_order_item as d where d.item_id = #{item_id} and s.order_sn = d.order_sn and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(s.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')) = #{time}
SELECT min(current_price) FROM tb_model as s where s.item_id = #{item_id}
SELECT sum(count) FROM tb_order_item as s where s.item_id = #{item_id}
SELECT sum(count) FROM tb_order_item as s where s.model_id = #{model_id}
SELECT s.sku_name as itemSku, min(s.current_price) as price, min(p.create_time) as createTime FROM tb_model as s left join tb_product as t on s.item_id = t.id where s.sku_name = #{sku_name}
